title: Federico Bertoia
text: I am a first-year PhD student in Statistical Data Analysis at Ghent University under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Stijn Vansteelandt (Ghent University).

title: Federico Bertoia
text:
Education

PhD in Statistical Data Analysis, Ghent University, Belgium
Nov 2024 - Aug 2028 (expected)
MSc in Economics and Econometrics, University of Bologna, Italy
Sept 2021 - Dec 2023
BSc in Economia Aziendale, University of Bologna, Italy
Sept 2018 - July 2021
